description: System-generated unique identifier for the department record, used as the primary key and for joins.
Business identifier or short code for the department; typically unique and used in operations and user interfaces.
Human-readable full name or long description of the department for display and reporting.
Optional free-text notes or remarks about the department.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp recorded by application auditing for the last user-driven change; likely overlaps with other modified dates; confirm with SME.
User account that created the department record.
Timestamp when the department record was created.
User account that last updated the department record.
Timestamp of the most recent update performed by a user.
